Posts.Content: Feb 19, 2007 07:44AM chism2be wrote: I just had a stereotactic biopsy to remove several microcalcifications from my right breast last Friday. My procedure went much as described above, except they had me lay on my side instead of my stomach. It was a lot more entailed then what I expected. They ended up taking eight samples and it took about an hour. I have a 4 year old and a 2 year old, so it has been difficult not being to pick them up. I should get results back this week, so I'm praying everything is benign. I'm really glad I found this web site to get some support!
Posts.Title: what to expect at/after stereotactic biopsy? lynnapin MelissaDallas
